clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in left upper lobe.
Well-defined nodule measuring 34 mm in left upper lobe.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left upper lobe.
Enlarged lymph nodes in left upper lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Pulmonary edema with perihilar haze in left upper lobe.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left upper lobe.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
